dashboard.pleaseSelectARepresentative: Please pick an elected official above...
dashboard.name: Name
dashboard.restoreConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to do this?  You will lose any changes you have made.
dashboard.personalizeLetter: Click the edit icons below to personalize your letter, then print
dashboard.stampsInstructions: If not head over to &cpn; to print one now.
dashboard.envelopeInstructions: Order a pack at &cpn; to arrive quickly.
dashboard.printerInstructions: You may have to disable the Header and Footer in 'More Settings'
dashboard.grabAPen: Grab a pen to sign your letter!
dashboard.noTemplageMessage:
Unfortunately we do not have a template on this issue for this elected official at this time.
However, we encourage you to write your own letter about the issue.

If you want to submit a template to us, drop us a line at &cpn;
dashboard.noTemplageEmailSubject: Missing template for issue '%s', %s state, %s level
dashboard.noTemplageEmailBody: Please write your template proposal below:
dashboard.callOfficialTitle: Got time for a phone call?
dashboard.callOfficialMessage: Increase your impact by calling %s at &cpn; .
dashboard.shareOnSocials: Share your letter and inspire others to write!
dashboard.socialMessage: Just wrote a letter to %s through www.writetocongress.org. It's fast and makes an impact - start writing!

gateways.invalidAddress: No elected officials were found for this state/zip combination

welcome.title: Write to Congress
welcome.welcomeMessage: Enter your address to find the elected officials who represent your district and state.
